title: Don't know if my exp boost is working
body: Hey I just bought some riot points solely for the purpose of using the exp boost. I do not see the exp boost icon or I might just not be able to see it. Please let me know how I can find it for I have looked on other threads and I don't think it is working.

replies.body:
It's working ^_^! Looks like you bought a timed boost, so that should take effect in games you play until Dec 6th!

For instance: in the most recent game you got a base xp of 139 and an additional 139 on top of that.

You can see it on your client. I'll show you below.

All boosts will be viewable here, with your durations.
https://i.imgur.com/2YTmESP.png
